p: The title compound was prepared according to the general procedure for the synthesis of N-Aryl-benzenesulfonamides previously described using 116 mg of (2-Amino-5-chloro-phenyl)-pyridin-4-yl-methanone and 101 mg of 4-methoxy-benzenesulfonyl chloride. 1H-NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3): δ 3.74 (s, 3H), 6.77 (d, 2H, J = 8.8 Hz), 7.21 (m, 2H), 7.27 (d, 1H, J = 2 Hz), 7.52 (dd, 1H, J = 8.8 Hz, 2.8 Hz), 7.63 (m, 2H), 7.76 (d, 1H, J = 8.8 Hz), 8.76 (d, 2H, J = 5.6 Hz), 9.88 (s, 1H). MS: m/z 403.9 (M + + 1).
